compatibility.notes: The GFDL-1.1 license has a strong copyleft requirement, meaning that any derivative work must also be distributed under the same license. This can lead to compatibility issues with permissive licenses.

key_requirements: The Document must be distributed under the same license.
Must provide proper attribution to the original authors.
Must include a notice stating that the Document is licensed under the GFDL.
license.name: GFDL-1.1
obligations: Must include a copy of the license when distributing the Document.
Must disclose modifications made to the Document.
Must keep Invariant Sections intact if they are included in the Document.
